word:
If men would only humble themselves before God, if they would not exalt their judgment as the all-controlling influence, if they would make room for 


                                   -33- 

the Lord to plan and work, the Lord would use the qualifications He has given them in a way which would glorify His name. He will purify His workers from all selfishness, trimming down their superfluous plans, cutting off the branches that would run and entwine around this and that undesirable object, pruning the vine so that it will produce fruit.
